description:
Taneshima finds Sota`s student ID that he left at the restaurant. Knowing that he`ll need it the next day, she decides to deliver it to him at his house, not knowing the chaos doing so will bring upon Wagnaria the following day.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Eve of the Duel!? Taneshima`s Reciprocation.
Naze ka!? no Kessen Zenya. Taneshima no Ongaeshi
なぜか!? の決戦前夜. 種島[たねしま]の恩返し
